# User Localized Time

Localize dates and times for users on the frontend of your website.

**Contributors:** [fjarrett](https://profiles.wordpress.org/fjarrett)  
**Tags:** [admin](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/admin), [localization](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/localization), [users](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/users)  
**Requires at least:** 3.0  
**Tested up to:** 4.2  
**Stable tag:** 0.1.0  
**License:** [GPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html)  

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/fjarrett/user-localized-time.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/fjarrett/user-localized-time)
